Tucson sends out a sonar wave, and quickly finds the hook with his hand, wr=
apping around his arms securely.  He looks down to the others.
" All right,=
 I have the cable.  Can you pull more than just one of us up at a time?  If=
 not, I'll wait until the others are up there safely."

o

ausing the cable to sway slightly.

m the topside of the pit. While his
